modName: Ashara Dimonized Dress and jewelry - UNP - male - CBBE
summary: This mod adds to Skyrim several pieces of clothing in different colours and some pieces of jewelry. Each piece is a different object so you can combine them as you prefer. All items can be enchanted by your character. The items added by this mod can be bought from a vendor, Sylva, that is at the Silver Blood Inn, in Markarth.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=yellow]
[size=3]---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
You can not use my assets in any mods/files that are being sold, for money, on Steam Workshop or other platforms
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/size]
[/color][/center]

Name: Ashara's "Dimonized" Romantic Dress and Dragon jewelry
Version: 4.1
Date: 14-12-2013
Category: Clothing
Requirements: Latest Skyrim official patch
Author(s): Ashara
Source:
* Nexus: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14146
* On Steam (only the Dragon and Bear jewelry): http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=201229179
* Russian version by dedmihail: http://modgames.net/load/276-1-0-15630
* Chinese version by a1126429003: http://bbs.3dmgame.com/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=4223396&extra=

[center][size=14][color=yellow]Description
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
The idea of this mod came to me after seeing the clothes resources released by Dimon ([url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11882]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11882[/url]), and this mod uses most of them. It is not lore-friendly, I've made it just for fun.

This mod adds to Skyrim several pieces of clothing in different colours and some pieces of jewelry. Each piece is a different object so you can combine them as you prefer. All pieces of jewelry except the earrings, are also available for male characters.
All items can be enchanted by your character. All the items added by this mod can be bought from a vendor, Sylva, that is at the Silver Blood Inn, in Markarth. All the jewelry can also be crafted at normal forges, under the Jewelry section.

It can be installed using Nexus Mod Manager (download it here: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/content/modmanager/) or manually.

The female bodies used for the dress and jewelry are the default UNP bodies and the male bodies used for the jewelry are the default Sundracon bodies . If you use another body mod you may see weird textures in places were the outfits show the skin or the pieces of clothing and jewelry won't fit well.

There is a patch under the optional files, that adapts the Dragon bracelets to the CBBE body. I haven't adapted the Falmer bracelets to the CBBE body yet.

I've followed the slot usage convention set in this thread: http://forums.bethsoft.com/topic/1344290-body-part-ids-for-unused-biped-nodes-consensus/

[color=red]IMPORTANT:
--------------
Version 3.0 uses and esp file instead of an esm file, as that is no longer required. If you are updating from a previous version to version 3.0, you will loose all the items you had from this mod. Best way of upgrading is:
* sell all the items you had from this mod
* travel to a different location than the place where the merchant you've sold everything is
* wait 3 days
* save your game
* deactivate the old version
* load the game and save it again in a new slot
* activate the new version
* load the last saved game and play normally[/color]

[size=14][color=yellow]Required mods
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
The female bodies used for the dress and jewelry are the default UNP bodies ([url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709[/url]). If you use another body mod you may see weird textures in places were the clothing shows the skin or see some clipping.

The male bodies used for the jewelry are the default Sundracon bodies ([url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2488]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2488[/url]). If you use another body mod you may see some clipping.

There is an optional file that adapts the dragon armlets to the CBBE body.

[size=14][color=yellow]Install
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
Install using Nexus Mod Manager (NMM)
-------------------------------------
1. Download the file
2. Select the file in the Mods tab of NMM, and click on the "Activates the selected mod" button.

If asked if you want to overwrite existing files say "Yes to all".

Manual install
--------------
1. Extract the files of this mod to a temporary location (you can use 7zip: http://www.7-zip.org, to unzip them) and chek the folder structure.
2. Copy to (install folder)SkyrimData:
.- the AsharaDimonizedDress.esm
.- the meshes folder
.- the textures folder
3. Open the Skyrim launcher and in "Data files" check the AsharaDimonizedDress.esm. Make sure that the esm is loaded after Skyrim.esm and Update.esm and that both are active.

If asked if you want to overwrite existing files say "Yes to all".

[size=14][color=yellow]Update
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
Version 3.0 uses and esp file instead of an esm file, as that is no longer required. If you are updating from a previous version to version 3.0, you will loose all the items you had from this mod. Best way of upgrading is:
* sell all the items you had from this mod
* travel to a different location than the place where the merchant you've sold everything is
* wait 3 days
* save your game
* deinstall the old version
* load the game and save it again in a new slot
* install the new version
* load the last saved game and play normally

[size=14][color=yellow]Uninstall
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
Uninstall using Nexus Mod Manager (NMM)
-------------------------------------
1. Select the file in the Mods tab of NMM, and click on the "Deactivates the selected mod" button.

Manual uninstall
----------------
1. Delete:
.- the AsharaDimonizedDress.esm
.- the folder texturesactorscharacterfacegendatafacetintAsharaDimonizedDress.esm and its contents
.- the folder texturesAsharaDimonized dress and its contents
.- the folder meshesactorscharacterFaceGenDataFaceGeomAsharaDimonizedDress.esm and its contents
.- the folder meshesAsharaDimonized dress and its contents

[size=14][color=yellow]Incompatibility
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
None that I am aware of. If you find anything, please tell me.

[size=14][color=yellow]Known issues or bugs
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
There is some clipping in some poses. The falmer eye bracelets flicker under some lighting conditions.
If you find anything else, please tell me.

[size=14][color=yellow]Mods used in pictures
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
The characters shown in pictures can be found here as presets:
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6075]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6075[/url]

[size=14][color=yellow]Related mods
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
* CrimsonGeezer's [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21801/]Karena Imperial Destruction Mage UNP[/url]. Karena uses jewelsry from this mod.
* Foaman's [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24684]UNP Clothing Merchants[/url]. The items of this mod are added to another merchant named Victoria.
* anka01's [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38053//?]Northgirl Armor UNP[/url]. It uses a retextured version of the trousers and inventory objects from this mod.
* zzjay's [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/43127/?]Ashara dimonized dress lace retexture by zzjay[/url]. A beautiful retexture of some of the items on this mod.
* anka01's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48652/?]Eldrids Armor Mashup UNP[/url]. It uses a retextured version of the trousers
* Bluenaim's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49494/?]Bamz Nzchelzulft[/url]. It uses items from this mod
* zzjay's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53442/?]zzjay's wardrobe[/url]. It uses some items from this mod.

[size=14][color=yellow]Tutorials
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
* [url=http://wiki.tesnexus.com/index.php?title=Creating_an_armour_for_Skyrim._Part_1]Creating an armour for Skyrim. Part 1[/url]
* [url=http://wiki.tesnexus.com/index.php?title=Creating_an_armour_for_Skyrim._Part_2]Creating an armour for Skyrim. Part 2[/url]
* [url=http://wiki.tesnexus.com/index.php?title=Converting_an_armour_to_another_body_for_Skyrim]Converting an armour to another body for Skyrim[/url]
* [url=http://wiki.tesnexus.com/index.php?title=User:SydneyB]Other Tutorials[/url]

[size=14][color=yellow]History
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
4.1, 14-12-2013 - Added the bear jewelry to Sylva so she can sell it.
4.0, 08-12-2013 - Uploaded an optional file that replaces all the armlest meshes with CBBE meshes. Now all jewelry fits the CBBE body.
4.0, 06-12-2013 - Added the Bear jewelry. Fixed the transparency flags in the trousers meshes. Renamed the Bracelets to Armlets (correct name).
3.2, 24-02-2013 - Made the gemstone in all Falmer eye earrings smaller.
3.1, 21-02-2013 - Circlets now are displayed on beast races. They may clip with the head of those races as their head meshes have a different shape than human's.
3.0, 16-02-2013 - Added chokers and rings. Added Falmer eye jewelry. The corset now includes the pants. Fixed the Dragon circlet for male characters. The file now comes as an esp file instead of an esm file.
2.4, 30-04-2012 - Added the Default race to necklace, earrings and bracelets.
2.3, 22-04-2012 - Fixed esm flag + Added a bracelet patch to make them compatible with CBBE v3 body. Now all jewelry works fine for CBBE v3, too.
2.2, 22-04-2012 - Packaged the right textures for bracelet 2
2.1, 22-04-2012 - Eliminated the slots for the forearms and claves from the Corset armour addons, keeping only the body slot.
2.0, 09-04-2012 - Added some circlets and bracelets. All jewelry except earrings is also available to male characters.
1.2, 04-04-2012 - Added dragon necklace and earrings.
1.1, 03-04-2012 - Fixed stockings, now they follow the weight slider properly
1.0, 01-04-2012 - Initial release.

[size=14][color=yellow]Contact
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
You can contact me leaving a comment at the mod's thread, sending me a PM or leaving a comment at the mod's thread.

You can find me on Nexus as SydneyB: http://www.tesnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=259193.
You can find me on the Bethesda official forums as Ashara: http://www.bethsoft.com/bgsforums/index.php?showuser=364891.
You can find me on Clan Dlan as Ashara: http://www.clandlan.net/foros/index.php?showuser=6932.

[size=14][color=yellow]Credits
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to Dimon for the UNP female body and for the clothes resources.
Thanks to Caliente for the CBBE female body.
Thanks to Chris57 and Sundracon for the male body.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on: [url=http://hammondslegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp]http://hammondslegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp[/url]
Thanks to Nexus for the a one-stop-shop resource for authors and players.
Thanks to all the modding community for all their tutorials, tools and help. Especially, thanks to the Clan Dlan, Tes Adventures, Bethesda Official Forum and the Nexus communities.
Thanks to all of you that are using this mod and are helping me to improve it with your suggestions.

[size=14][color=yellow]Tools used
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
Blender - http://www.blender.org
GIMP - http://www.gimp.org/
The Compressonator - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=11852
NIFSkope - http://www.niftools.org/
Construction Kit (available on Steam)
7zip - http://www.7-zip.org/

[size=14][color=yellow]Permissions
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
You can reuse any part of this mod into your own mod but all I ask in return is that you give me credit if you distribute any part of this mod. If you want to reuse the skirts, trousers and/or stockings you must credit Dimon too and release your mod on Nexus.
You cannot port neither the dragon nor the falmer eye meshes/textures of the jewelry into another game as those objects are part of vanilla Skyrim.

[size=14][color=yellow]My Skyrim mods
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
